description:
Equippable messages that appear above playable characters' heads. You can choose from 10 different messages.

It's all ogre... x 10
Ooh, la, la... x 10
OH MY GODDESS!!! x 10
I! LOVE! FISHING!!! x 10
Inspection Results x 10
Cute is justice! x 10
Passionate Salute x 10
Live from Zemuria! x 10
Grandmaster Reveal x 10
Manly Proclamation x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
name: Trails of Cold Steel IV: Self-Assertion Panels Vol. 2
